item.description:
This meetup is our third in a series of monthly "Show & Tell" meetups for you to show your work, be it in a portfolio, hanging on your body, on a laptop or the web.

This month's "Show & Tell" has a theme. "Spring Fling" Bring your spring art, your organic forms and nature inspired works to usher in the new season. Soon we will be drinking iced coffee and meeting in the park, where our musical members can shine.

Please RSVP, I will need a head count so I know if we will need to hold extra tables.

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "meetup" sign on the table
item.why: Looking at others work is a great way to get to know other members with similar or complementary creative passions to your own.
item.name: Creative "Show & Tell"
